dataList.name: Punish the You branch Heishou.
dataList.desc:
"Hey, you've come at just the right time. Listen, I need your advice."

We walked into a room with two Heishou glaring at each other, both of their buggy eyes bloodshot and clearly angry.

They explained to me that a Heishou of the You branch, in service of Xichun, happened to get into a kerfuffle with another Heishou.

"... And that's about the gist of it. Good thing they're both from my branches. A simple punishment wouldn't have been enough otherwise."

Like Xichun said, it seemed that they had decided to punish the Heishou of the You branch, who started the fight.

"How should I go about this?"

options.message: Take the Heishou - You's talon—the Xueyan Blade.
options.messageDesc: Wrath & Gluttony Advantage check. Pass to gain a Burn E.G.O Gift.

options.message: Sentence the Heishou to a weeklong detention in binds.
result:
"... Hm, yeah. That's what I was thinking of doing, too."

Xichun sentenced the Heishou to a detention.

"Your will is my command. No same incident shall ever occur again, I promise.

The Heishou of the You branch gladly tied their own arms together.

... Xichun doesn't seem to find this resolution satisfying.

dataList.name: Suspicious Red Cloth
dataList.desc:
One after-school afternoon.

Xichun invited the Sinners to her office.

One of the Sinners notices a piece of red cloth on the ground, and inquires about it—but she only tilts her head curiously.

"That's not mine. That's... weird. I thought I cleared out all of the former Jia Mu's stuff..."

The red cloth was soaked in what appeared to be ominous, tarnished blood.

options.message: Offer to take it with us if she has no need for it.
options.messageDesc: Pride & Gluttony Advantage check. Pass to gain a Slash E.G.O Gift.

options.message: Tell her that we don't need it.
result:
"Gotcha. Then let's get this thing out of here."

Jia Xichun summons a servant to take the red cloth and burn it away, disturbed by its presence.

At her request, the servant makes a strange face... but it's probably no big deal.

dataList.name: Office Hours for Jia Xichun
dataList.desc:
It's another day of classes for Jia Xichun, who's trying her best to prove her right to be the Family Hierarch.

After class...

... Jia Xichun came to visit the Sinners who taught today's classes.

"Guys, is it office hours? There were some things I didn't quite understand about today's class..."

The Sinners... or, rather, the teachers, turned to pay attention to Jia Xichun's questions.

options.messageDesc: Select to gain a Zhi (智) related E.G.O Gift
result:
"In order to understand the patterns and exceptions by which the mobile rooms operate on Restructuring Days..."

"By following the guidance of your heart instead of relying solely on sight..."

"And that is precisely why psychological shock is a much more superior method than physical pain..."

Some Sinners who specialized in "Zhi" step up to answer her questions.

After a few exchanges, Xichun gives us a confident nod.

"Thanks. I'll be back if there's anything else I didn't quite get."

options.messageDesc: Select to gain a Yong (勇) related E.G.O Gift
result:
"First step is to take a deep breath and look around. There has to be a clue somewhere around you, and a good dice roll can—Ah, I mean—"

"It's all about confidence, mmkay? Keep up that radiant smile, even if you've got dealt a terrible hand..."

"Right, lass! Remember, it's all in that glare..."

Some Sinners who specialized in "Yong" stepped up to answer her questions.

After a few exchanges, Xichun gives us a confident nod.

"Thanks. I'll be back if there's anything else I didn't quite get."

options.messageDesc: Select to gain a Ren (仁) related E.G.O Gift
result:
"The left-handed self in the mirror is a left-handed self who knows not to receive your handshake..."

"If I am to speak upon the subject of the honorable Fixer Yue Fei, verily, it could be said that he boasted a bond most loyal with his compatriots..."

"So you've got to look through a K.L. to U.K."

"... So you've got to look through a kid's lens to understand kids, she says."

Some Sinners who specialized in "Ren" stepped up to answer her questions.

After a few exchanges, Xichun gives us a confident nod.

"Thanks. I'll be back if there's anything else I didn't quite get."

dataList.name: Someone fenced Heishou Pack - Wu Branch gear
dataList.desc:
The black market of District 8 Backstreets were full of interesting yet dangerous items.

Boluses that make you smarter at the cost of hair loss.

An Anamnaworm of someone who has tasted all kinds of wonderful cuisines.

But the one that stood out to us was...

"...? What's that doing there?"

"Dante, that thing's clearly been fenced. Maybe we can... "yoink" it, if ya know what I mean?"

options.message: Admonish the merchant, claim that the gear was stolen from us
options.messageDesc: Sloth & Gluttony Advantage check. Pass to gain a Tremor E.G.O Gift.
Select to gain a Tremor E.G.O Gift
result:
Better to pay for it without stirring unnecessary trouble about the item being fenced gear and whatnot.

"You've got good eye, sirs and ladies."

The merchant sold the gear at a dirt-cheap price, clearly wishing to wash his hands of it as soon as possible.

"These... according to confirmed information, bear a resemblance to the gear of the "Wu" branch.

Looks like we just got ourselves some lost Heishou Pack - Wu Branch gear.
